reviews.review_msg: She marks so hard and not very fair, she showed us her grading rubric and uses terms such as "meh", thought that was very rude. She is understandable when it comes to deadlines, gives you a "grace period" for due dates which is helpful. But still wouldn't take a class with her again. I wanted to like her but she was not helpful during covid at all.

Her class became more like weird group therapy of students just ranting about things. Each class began with a discussion over readings and it was never helpful but felt very forced to speak as she just stares at you until you do. Her lectures are more history based and not solely focused on GSWS content.
